snippet: Rafa Nadal has won more Roland Garros titles than anyone yet he has been shunted off the main showcourt on Wednesday to make way for Frenchman Gael Monfils who has never made a grand slam final in almost a decade of trying....

headline.print_headline: Monfils Takes Center Stage in Paris Ahead of Nadal
headline.main: Monfils Takes Center Stage in Paris Ahead of Nadal

lead_paragraph: Rafa Nadal has won more Roland Garros titles than anyone yet he has been shunted off the main showcourt on Wednesday to make way for Frenchman Gael Monfils who has never made a grand slam final in almost a decade of trying.
